Went around 1pm on a Sunday to watch some football. Lots of screens to watch the games which was nice. As of 11.2.25 the Brunch menu prefix is $20 and even if you sit at the bar you and you only want the entree you will pay for the prefix. So make sure you get soup or salad and your desser. I took mine to go. I had the Dominican/tres golpes and it didn't disappoint! Great spot for a group meet up!

our server Leo was great. the food was amazing and the music and ambiance were great. would recommend and will come again.

Nice place great lunch special
Lizsandra in the bar, is extremely serviceable and always takes great care of us. The food is out of this world and the drinks are excellent.

Excelente servicio y atenci√≥n personalizada

Siempre almorzamos en Inwood Bar and Grill, y nuestra mesera Yeidy Veloz hace que cada visita sea una experiencia excelente. Es atenta, amable y profesional, siempre con una sonrisa y una disposici√≥n incre√≠ble para asegurarse de que todo est√© perfecto.
El servicio es r√°pido, la comida siempre llega caliente y deliciosa, y Yeidy recuerda hasta nuestros pedidos favoritos. Este tipo de atenci√≥n marca la diferencia y hace que regresemos cada semana.

If you haven‚Äôt been to Inwood Bar and Grill, you‚Äôre seriously missing out. The place has that perfect mix of good music, amazing energy, and food that‚Äôll make you forget about your diet in two seconds flat.

But the real star of the show? Yeidy! She was super friendly, funny, and on point with everything. Drinks came fast, the food was hot, and somehow she managed to keep a smile even when the place got packed ‚Äî that‚Äôs a true pro!

Yeidy made sure we were laughing, eating, and vibing the whole time. It‚Äôs rare to find someone who turns a regular night out into a great time, but she nailed it.

So yeah ‚Äî come for the food, stay for the drinks, and ask for Yeidy. You‚Äôll thank me later (and probably end up staying longer than planned üòÖ)

Chanty was amazing. Una alma de Dios. She made my visit memorable. She‚Äôs so insightful, kind, considerate and made me feel seen. You don‚Äôt get that often. You‚Äôre lucky to have her! I will definitely be back and will look for her every time because of her wonderful customer service. Que Dios me la bendiga!
Chanty was so sweet and made sure everything was just right. Her energy was great and I will definitely be back soon.
Chanty excelente servicio.muchas gracias chanty
Chanty is EXCELLENT!!!!! We will be back!!! Above and Beyond service, courtesy.  I Love Chanty! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Chanty me atendi√≥ y fue un excelente servicio !!!

This place is always great. Whether you want brunch, dinner or something else they have it all. Brunch is the best time to go but there‚Äôs barely parking no matter what day or time you go. There‚Äôs always great music, there‚Äôs a downstairs section if you want something more intimate and the music isn‚Äôt as loud. The bathroom is a vibe with giant mirrors, flowers, a beautiful sink in the middle, the perfect place for pictures especially if you‚Äôre taking drunk ones with your friends. Their food is always great with huge portions. The staff are super nice, the bar is perfect for game nights, and you can celebrate anything and everything here. Don‚Äôt skip this place!!!! 100/100

Walked in and the staff immediately put me at ease.  I ordered the steak and eggs and  it was amazing.  By the way you can get it with some fries or shrimp but I didn't want to ruin my workout.  üòä  See you soon.
Great experience Warm atmosphere, friendly staff, and delicious food.  Highly recommend for any occasion ‚Äì can‚Äôt wait to return!
La mesera Karla 10/10, me encant√≥ la atenta que es, es bien carism√°tica y simp√°tica!!!
Best place my favorite spot. 100% Recommend.

The food itself is good dining in, but God forbid you use Uber eats. The delivery is always wrong without fail. I‚Äôd take a picture of it, but I‚Äôd be taking a picture of nothing - i.e. missing items.

Inwood Bar & Grill is one of my favorite spots in the neighborhood! Their lunch specials are amazing ‚Äî Monday through Friday from 12‚Äì4pm, with meals starting as low as $5, which is almost impossible to find these days. The food is always fresh and tasty, and the portions are great for the price. And don‚Äôt skip dessert ‚Äî during the lunch special, you can get their flan for only $1, and it‚Äôs delicious.

Their happy hour is another reason I keep coming back! Mondays they offer a two-for-one happy hour, and on Tuesdays, happy hour lasts all night ‚Äî you really can‚Äôt beat that.

I also have to mention their virgin pi√±a colada ‚Äî it‚Äôs honestly the best I‚Äôve ever had anywhere! If you‚Äôre a pi√±a colada fan, this is a must-try.
Delicious food and the music is great
Los mejores es como estar en tu propio negocio las atenciones el ambiente la comida el final üî•üî•üî• el servicio es n√∫mero uno
Great place for food and drinks.  Music is awesome and everything is organized and clean
Me encanta este lugar, mi experiencia fue mi grata, servicio al cliente de primera, cada vez que voy a NY, me gusta ir, el chef de este lugar se merece m√°s que 5 estrellas.
The best place to celebrate any special occasion. Good food , good music and nice service from the staff
Guacamole was too mushy, but overall the drinks was amazing!
Yeidi is the best
S√∫per atenta la chica que nos atendi√≥ necesitamos m√°s personas como ella. Gracias yeidy  por tus atenciones

Chanty un servicio excelente nos recomend√≥ el especial de lo jueves todo rico pero lo que se destaca fue su personalidad tan AMABLE CHISTOSA DULCE Y una atenci√≥n al detalle incre√≠ble yo eh venido a este negocio muchas veces pero nunca eh tenido una mesera como la chanty ELLA MARCA LA DIFERENCIA EN LA ESPERENCIA DE UN RESTAURANTE gracias por todo me hiciste feliz
Absolutely love it here every time I wanna have a drink and a meal come here. Chanty is amazing!!!!!!! The service is very attentive. Come here yall!!
CHANTY WAS AMAZING AND MADE ME FEEL BETTER TODAY WHEN I WAS FEELING MY LOWEST. NO ONE MADE ME LAUGH AND GIVEN AS GOOD AS A SERVICE AS SHES GIVEN

Excelente experiencia en Inwood Bar & Grill.
El ambiente es incre√≠ble, especialmente el patio, que es amplio y perfecto para compartir con amigos. La m√∫sica, la comida y las bebidas estuvieron de primera. Pero lo que realmente hizo la diferencia fue la atenci√≥n de Jorge, nuestro mesero: amable, atento y siempre pendiente de que no nos faltara nada. ¬°Un servicio de 10!
Sin duda, volver√© y lo recomiendo al 100%.

Jorge el mesero es el final
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Excellent experience at Inwood Bar & Grill.
The atmosphere is amazing, especially the patio, which is spacious and perfect for hanging out with friends. The music, food, and drinks were top-notch. But what really made the difference was the service from Jorge, our waiter: friendly, attentive, and always making sure we had everything we needed. Service was a 10!
I will definitely be back and highly recommend it.

High 5! I love the atmosphere. You can enjoy the spot without the food. The staff is very organized and the food is good! Check it out for yourself. If you thirsty and need hydration. Make yourself Happy!!!!

Ahhhh-mazing after-hours spot on a weeknight! I can imagine the environment on a wknd. 21 yrs & up. We were carded at the door. Impromptu visit, and they searched bags. Confiscated my 16oz water bottle though. We enjoyed the music, crowd, hookah, atmosphere, picturesque restroom area, and beyond. And the food - omgeeeeee the food!!! Drinks were great, we selected a pitcher of the passion fruit Don Juilio margarita - wheeeewww üòã. Lots of appetizers and an entr√©e for each of us.... Hidden Gem

I had such a great experience thanks to my server Chanty. She was so attentive, kind, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. Her positive attitude and professionalism really stood out  &  it made the whole meal even better. Highly recommend! Ask for Chanty!

If you‚Äôre looking for a spot with amazing BBQ, great drinks, and live music that keeps the vibe going, this is it! The food is packed with flavor, the cocktails are top-notch, and the atmosphere is unbeatable. The place is huge, so even when it‚Äôs packed, it never feels overcrowded. It is on the pricier side, but honestly, it‚Äôs worth every penny. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back again and again. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a lively, delicious night out!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Had a great experience at the inwood bar and grill, thanks to our amazing waitress Chanty. She was friendly, attentive, and made sure everything was perfect throughout our visit. Great service like that really makes a difference. Highly recommend stopping by‚Äîand if you get Chanty as your server, you're in good hands!

Inwood bar & grill is a party destination the main floor is the best got to go early to sit there or get lucky it‚Äôs the more party vibe. The downstairs is more the food and chill. Still hear the music but not as loud not as crazy. The outside it‚Äôs more lounge area the food is good nothing out of the world but the fish today was on point not gonna lie.  Best food I‚Äôve had here so far easily. Overall good music great vibes good time

Me encant√≥ el lugar, una muy buena comida, ambiente exquisito y una atenci√≥n de primera. Me gust√≥ tanto que ya reserv√© un brunch de fin de semana para celebrar con amigos mi cumplea√±os. Buena m√∫sica, un poco alta para mi gusto; pero una estancia agradable.
El ambiente es familiar, la comida es excelente, el precio es muy bueno y los tragos exquisitos, me encanta ese restaurante

Es un lugar muy muy nice para el p√∫blico dominicano. La bartender fue muy atenta y servicial, la m√∫sica uffff si eres dominicano la vas a disfrutar. Merengues de los 80 que me trasladaron a mi ni√±ez. Me tome 4 margaritas frozen muuuuy buenas y unos excelentes calamares fritos y la cuenta me hizo 50 d√≥lares, ser√© fijo aqu√≠ los lunes
El servicio en este restaurante es simplemente excepcional. Desde que llegamos nos hicieron sentir como en casa. El personal es atento, amable y muy profesional

This place has an issue with the hostess, there's never seating in the front and they always want to send you to the back or downstairs. I've been seating here for more than an hour and all the "reserved tables" are empty. Either the hostesses are asking for money for the front seats or something dishonest is going on. First come first serve would serve the business better and wouldn't look so scammy.

We went at very busy time. But the waitstaff was very friendly and accommodating. They accommodated our little ones and seated in an area where they were comfortable and not in other patron‚Äôs way. The food was very good. The restaurant was well maintained and very clean. That‚Äôs why it is our go to place.

First I would like to start of how great service was. Our server was sweet, patient and also gave us insightful recommendations. She respected our space and time and was excellent!I regret not taking her name, we sat downstairs in a more relaxed vibe. We got our order in and ordered our drinks. I always drink my whiskey (Jameson) neat!  I know my preferred drink very well and can tell when I ve been given another imposter. I called her over and she showed me that in her hand held device that she in fact ordered it (Jameson).  She went back up to the bar and when she came back of course they were gonna say they gave me Jameson. I knew they gave me some cheaper whiskey which was not smooth and way darker in color. I nearly cringed to the taste! Ewwww! Everyone who drinks Jameson knows it's extremely smooth! Now I know why some of my friends makes sure to visit the bar before settling into their tables to make sure their is more than one bottle of their preferred top shelf drinks. Its very deceptive to pay top shelf price when given low grade liquor. There are loyal customers as well as loyal brand drinkers. This is deceptive practice that is seen not only here at this establishment but in others as well. Pre-game for me and a visit to the bar a must! Nonetheless our experience was excellent with food...calamari was meaty and fresh, sauce a bit different, not plain marinara, I enjoyed the fresh squeeze lemon on the side.  Wings were a go!
I must add that our waitress was very accomodating and willing to change my drink for another option, I still stood with my drink and afterwards ordered Macallan and it was as is. Will revisit for sure with my guards up on the liquor.

*I must add that a review with one star, 7mths ago, also had the same experience with their drink. Couldn't read into more but I'm pretty sure there are more same experiences out there! Please stop this practice, you guys would be better if you played fair!

Amazing time and great service. We were a walk in party of two. I ordered the $20 brunch deal, which includes a three-course meal and a non-alcoholic beverage. It's $40 if you want bottomless alcoholic drinks. I‚Äôm usually hesitant on visiting Hispanic/Latin restaurants as a Black woman due to the mistreatment we usually face, but the service was stellar!!! My friend and I truly enjoyed the attentiveness and hospitality of the servers. The salmon was amazing, and my friend enjoyed her steak, shrimp, and fries. The flan Great food! I will be back!
The place is awesome! Had our sons birthday party here and the staff was so accommodating!  Big shout out to Stacy and her husband!  Thank you!  Must go in the Inwood community!
Awesomeness!! Good Food great prices  Awesome  service M-F specials!!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
El viernes fui atendida por Yeidy y realmente fue una experiencia excepcional. Su atenci√≥n fue excelente, muy amable y profesional. Me hizo sentir c√≥moda en todo momento y brind√≥ un servicio de primera. ¬°Definitivamente se nota su dedicaci√≥n y pasi√≥n por lo que hace!
Yhessika was a great hostess. Very professional and accommodating. The food was great . 10/10 all around. The food was too good. ü§èüèΩ And the music was great too.

The food was ok, the server brought it out right away that we order it . We order the spicy wings and they did not meet the taste, the drinks we ordered a frozen Sangria the taste was off sent it back and order a pi≈Ña colada. We arrived at around 4 the music was at an appropriate bar standards after 5 it turned into a night club super loud. Maybe I‚Äôll give it a second chance.
My first time and it was great. Everyone was very attentive and the food was fantastic. Pina coladas top notch best I've tasted in a long while.
Always enjoy my time at inwood bar and grill! Food is tasty and drinks are strong. 100% recommend!

The food was delicious!! We got the mofongo, chef special churrasco, and the Dominican burger. We also had desserts and the spinach dip appetizerss. Everything was delicious, and we‚Äôll priced. I wish I remembered out servers name, she was so amazing. The service was super fast and attentive and the music was lit. I would definitely return and recommend!

I was here most recently for a birthday brunch. Making the reservation could have been more enjoyable than it was, but it's all good. They sat us next to another party. It wasn't really crowded. We were ALL confused about their decision to do that. They did ask to be moved and were accommodated. One person worked our tables. She was really nice and did a good job taking care of us. She  made no mistakes! She explained things thoroughly. There were no surprises. The food was very good and came out pretty fast. The brunch options are limited.  That may be why. My only gripe was they are usually more timely with the refills. That ended up being okay. We had more to do later. The drinks are potent! The atmosphere was lit at our table. It was usually more crowded, but the weather was nasty. We had a great time! We will be back. 5 stars.

Muy recomendado, solo que por ser restaurante bar el volumen deber√≠a ser m√°s bajo, en ocasiones se saturaba, y en estos espacios debe quedar una franja sonora para que los comensales puedan conversar.

It was a very cool vibe for a Friday evening. I got to experience their Happy Hour specials. Their prices are amazing and service was fantastic. Unfortunately, the same couldn't be said about the food. We ordered a selection of the‚Ä¶

They have a $5 lunch menu and it is fantastic! Yummy, big portion, healthy and very important on my 30‚Äô break: fast.
Great place to grab a quick bite but also to have dinner with a big party. I will back soon. I‚Äôm still shocked with the price and quality of the food. 10/10!
I got a salad and rice with chicken and everything , plus taxes and tips were less than $13. I loved it in here!

This is my absolute favorite spot in Washington Heights. There is no bad time to come to Inwood bar and Grill.  There is something for everyone, Happy Hour, Weekend brunch and Live nighttime entertainment.  The food is good the drinks are even better and atmosphere is electric.  My favorite drink is the frozen sangria and you can never go wrong with the oxtails or steak and shrimp.

We came here for happy hour on a Thursday late afternoon after some appointments and meetings.  Definitely vibe in the atmosphere and in terms of energy was very electric shoot space we sat at the bar and we enjoyed beef skewers and french fries and we had our one of our specialty tequila and tonic with lime..

Our server Chanty was absolutely amazing. From the time that me and my party entered until we left she was super attentive. Her food and drink recommendations based on our needs were on super on point: highly recommended.üòçüòçüòç

A very lively bar/restaurant, although the music could have been tone down a notch in the main bar/dining area. Thank goodness our host offered us a table by the side of the area overlooking the colorful hung umbrellas. Service was spot on and professional. Our table was bussed and water refilled regularly by the staff. Happy Hour food and drinks were √Ähhhmazing and good value. Thank you, will definitely be back when I'm in the area

The food was amazing and worth its price. Service was great, our waiter (Eddy) actively kept track of us and ensured a smooth delivery.

Lastly, the atmosphere adapted to fit the scene, orderly and calm in the day, and exciting and fast-paced at night.

Inwood was great for me the few times I‚Äôve visited, and I recommend it to just about anyone. Five Stars!

I recently booked the party hall for my daughter's sweet sixteen on February 1, 2025, and I couldn't be happier with the experience! At first, I was a bit nervous about how everything would turn out, but Karen Veras was absolutely amazing. She made the entire process so smooth and stress-free. Choosing this venue was the best decision I could have made! I'm so grateful to Karen and her team for their incredible help, especially with the beautiful table decorations. The food is an amazing. Thank you for making this special day unforgettable!
Todo fue grandioso, servicio, sabor, calidad, precio y atenci√≥n‚Ä¶..gracias!

Our visit to this restaurant was a mixed experience. The appetizers were hot and quite good, which gave us a positive first impression. The air conditioning was comfortable, and the environment seemed family-oriented at first.

Unfortunately, the main courses were a big letdown. The burger bun was cold, the patty barely warm, the steak was rubbery and served cold, and the pasta arrived cold as well. The pasta sauce tasted like jarred Rag√∫, which didn‚Äôt help the overall quality.

Another concern was the music. For a family-friendly restaurant, the choice of songs‚Äîspecifically a Bad Bunny track with explicit lyrics‚Äîwas not appropriate. I don‚Äôt want my kids exposed to profanity while we‚Äôre trying to enjoy a meal out together.

Overall, while there were a few positives, the main dining experience and atmosphere need improvement before we‚Äôd consider returning.

This restaurant to celebrate with your family is a good option. You can share the Argentine grill with up to 4 -5 people. Mojitos were delicious, customer service 10/10. The prices are affordable and they have food for all tastes.

For birthday people ,they give you a good piece of cake and they sing your birthday. For those looking for more to have fun with friends, the best option is the one inside, which is more of a disco bar. for the patio the decoration of the lights and the umbrellas looks magnificent, besides that at night the roof is closed. I wholeheartedly recommend this site and would go back again

Great atmosphere. Food is delicious. Keep in mind it is very loud in here and they do allow smoking. Prices are acceptable. Do not get the fish bowl if you think your getting a big one. Its literally a small bowl galf the size of an actual big fish bowl. Use my photos for refference.

I had an excellent experience at Inwood Bar and Grill. The waitress Chanty was very nice and pleasant, making sure we felt comfortable and well taken care of throughout our visit. The food was absolutely amazing delicious, flavorful, and beautifully presented. I highly recommend this restaurant for a great dining experience. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

The lunch specials are $5 for a list of GOOD food and drinks. I got the peppered chicken, yellow rice and brown beans/ mango margarita. If you mix the sauce with some of the rice, DELISH! Latin vibe. Hookah $40 served during their dinner time. The music is amazing. I was there from 2:30 - 9pm. The people are so nice, vibe is amazing. Recommend for lunch and dinner. $5 food and drinks stop at 4pm I believe. Enjoy

I heard great things about the $5 lunch special and I was not disappointed. Irvin (hopefully I spelled it right) was an exceptional server. The food was very tasty and a generous amount for the price. I will return.

I came here one time for Sunday brunch & this has been my go to place for brunch since. They keep your drinks coming! BOTTOMLESS FOR REAL üçæü•Ç What‚Äôs even better is you could switch your drinks as many times as you like Mimosas, sangria, Berlin, etc. ü•Ç
The food is great well seasoned. I haven‚Äôt experienced a bad waiter, it‚Äôs always a vibe, Prices are affordable, drinks are strong (Just how they should be) & brunch includes appetizer, main course, & flan üçÆü§ó. Can‚Äôt beat that ü•∞ 10/10 !! & brunch is about $45 pp.
Make sure to reserve seating because the wait time could be long.
Chante is the best server ! She just did her biggest one ! She did everything we neeeded and more ! I love her she never left us without a pitcher and our food came one time !

Food taste was horrible the steak nd shrimp no taste at all  salad dry brunch was boring here muis was to low same songs repeat but the service was good .. food was left just like that as you see in picture
Food was good. Drinks were not watered down. Some tables were way too close for comfort, but ok. Came for Thursday dinner with family, and was pleasantly surprised to have live music. Nice vibe!!
